nodes.bodyText:
Please, change the path to cd $HOME/work/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/tests/theia_automation
And the same for the Windows part.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -12,36 +13,65 @@ Automate functional tests running on theia with Selenium Explorer in ZOS, Explor 2) Install virtualenv module + Windows: C:\Python3_x64\Scripts\pip3.exe install virtualenv + Linux: + pip3 install virtualenv + 3) Clone the repository + Windows: C:\WORK>git clone https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol.git - + + Linux: + $HOME/work$ git clone https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol.git + 4) Create the virtual environment + + Windows: cd C:\WORK\che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol\theia_automation C:\Python3_x64\python.exe -m virtualenv venv3_x64 - + + Linux: + + cd $HOME/work/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/theia_automation

@@ -12,36 +13,65 @@ Automate functional tests running on theia with Selenium Explorer in ZOS, Explor 2) Install virtualenv module + Windows: C:\Python3_x64\Scripts\pip3.exe install virtualenv + Linux: + pip3 install virtualenv + 3) Clone the repository + Windows: C:\WORK>git clone https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol.git - + + Linux: + $HOME/work$ git clone https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol.git + 4) Create the virtual environment + + Windows: cd C:\WORK\che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol\theia_automation C:\Python3_x64\python.exe -m virtualenv venv3_x64 - + + Linux: + + cd $HOME/work/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/theia_automation
